title: I got leavebustered from a computer crash in the first 30 seconds - could we revert this?
body:
Hey there, Onwodori here.

So straight to it - my computer crashed while I was just starting a game so I guess my team did the re-make function and I now have a 5 game leavebuster penalty where I need to wait 20 minutes for a queue. Could I please have this punishment taken off?

-Onwodori

replies.body:
Unfortunately, regardless of the reason for disconnecting from a match, the absence negatively impacts everyone in it. This is prime reason why the system treats all disconnections equally and why penalties cannot be modified in any way.

Additionally, it's impossible to get a 5x 20min LPQueue from a single disconnection. We understand that sometimes *stuff just goes wrong* or *an emergency* happens. It takes a trend of disconnections before you'll see a penalty as severe as this.

If you're experiencing this crash often, or if any other technical issues are causing you to continuously disconnect from matches, please let me know. I'd be happy to point you in the right direction to resolve this.
